ACH_SUPPORT_MAIN.name: Support Specialist
ACH_SUPPORT_MAIN.description: Have 4 healing Active Memories at once.

ACH_BALANCE_FOREVER_LOST.name: Balance Forever Lost
ACH_BALANCE_FOREVER_LOST.description: Fight against the Guardian Twins simultaneously and emerge victorious.

ACH_ONCE_UPON_A_TIME.name: Once Upon a Time
ACH_ONCE_UPON_A_TIME.description: Keep any Traveler's Movement Speed above 900 for 3 seconds.

ACH_REACTIVATED.name: Reactivated
ACH_REACTIVATED.description: Breathe life into the wooden doll.

ACH_BARE_SKIN_SUPREMACY.name: Naked and Unafraid
ACH_BARE_SKIN_SUPREMACY.description: Enter the Pure White Dream 2 time(s) without receiving or granting any shields.

ACH_NOVICE_TREASURE_HUNTER.name: Novice Treasure Hunter
ACH_NOVICE_TREASURE_HUNTER.description: Open a treasure chest for the first time.

ACH_MASTER_OF_HAMMER.name: Master of the Hammer
ACH_MASTER_OF_HAMMER.description: Perform 9 basic attacks within 5 seconds using Vesper.

ACH_LIKE_A_BREEZE.name: A Piece of Cake
ACH_LIKE_A_BREEZE.description: Defeat a Heroic Boss without taking any damage as Bismuth.

ACH_HORNS_FEATHERS_AND_GOLD.name: Horns, Feathers, and Gold
ACH_HORNS_FEATHERS_AND_GOLD.description: Heal yourself or allies for a total of 25,000 Health.

ACH_JUST_LIKE_THE_OLD_DAYS.name: Just Like the Old Days
ACH_JUST_LIKE_THE_OLD_DAYS.description: Defeat the Heroic Boss 5 times as Lacerta.

ACH_PEAK_PERFORMANCE.name: Peak Performance
ACH_PEAK_PERFORMANCE.description: Have 3 Dash or Teleport Memories at once as Vesper.

ACH_PURE_IMAGINATION.name: Pure Imagination
ACH_PURE_IMAGINATION.description: Acquire a total of 450 Dream Dust.

ACH_SHIELD_BATTERY.name: Barrier Battery
ACH_SHIELD_BATTERY.description: Mitigate a total of 20,000 damage from enemies using Barriers.

ACH_WRIST_FRIENDLY_BUILD.name: Wrist-Friendly Build
ACH_WRIST_FRIENDLY_BUILD.description: Enter Pure White Dream with 4 active Memories that have a cooldown of 6 seconds or longer.

ACH_PRAISE_THE_SUN.name: Praise the Sun!
ACH_PRAISE_THE_SUN.description: Apply a total of 3,000 Fire stacks to enemies.

ACH_FLEXIBLE_DIET.name: Flexible Diet
ACH_FLEXIBLE_DIET.description: During a single adventure, let your Health fall below 40% and then bring it back up to at least 75% 10 times.

ACH_PEACE_AMID_THE_STORM.name: Peace Amid the Storm
ACH_PEACE_AMID_THE_STORM.description: Deal a total of 400,000 Light damage to enemies as Yubar.

ACH_TRUE_SUPPORT.name: True Support
ACH_TRUE_SUPPORT.description: Fully heal an allied Traveler below 30% Health within 1 seconds.

ACH_OVERFLOWING_HEALS.name: Overflowing Healing
ACH_OVERFLOWING_HEALS.description: As Aurena, fully restore your Health in one use of Dangerous Theory when your Health is below 40%.

ACH_KING_OF_THE_ELEMENTALS.name: Elemental Lord
ACH_KING_OF_THE_ELEMENTALS.description: Defeat any elemental 75 times as Mist.

ACH_ELEMENTALS_101.name: Introduction to Elements
ACH_ELEMENTALS_101.description: Defeat enemies affected by all 4 elements 70 times.

ACH_EMPTY_CANVAS.name: Empty Canvas
ACH_EMPTY_CANVAS.description: Enter the Pure White Dream 2 times in total.

ACH_CHAOTIC_GOOD.name: Chaotic Good
ACH_CHAOTIC_GOOD.description: Use Legendary Chaos a total of 5 times.

ACH_REAP_WHAT_YOU_SOW.name: Reap What You Sow
ACH_REAP_WHAT_YOU_SOW.description: Activate the Shrine of Dismantling 12 times.

ACH_MASTER_OF_EVASION.name: Master of Evasion
ACH_MASTER_OF_EVASION.description: Complete the Forest of Turbulence without taking any damage from enemies.

ACH_DESPERATE_HERO.name: Desperate Hero
ACH_DESPERATE_HERO.description: Defeat 30 enemies in a row while your Health is below 40%.

ACH_IN_CARNAGE_I_BLOOM.name: In Carnage I Bloom
ACH_IN_CARNAGE_I_BLOOM.description: Empower Memories that deal Dark damage 20 times in a single adventure.

ACH_DOUBLE_VISION.name: Double Vision
ACH_DOUBLE_VISION.description: Deal a total of 250,000 Dark damage to enemies as Bismuth.

ACH_FOUR_OF_A_KIND.name: Four of a Kind
ACH_FOUR_OF_A_KIND.description: Enter the Pure White Dream while having 4 Memories of the same type.

ACH_KYAAAAAA.name: AAAAAAAHH!!
ACH_KYAAAAAA.description: Survive a single hit that deals 70% or more of your Maximum Health while you have no Barrier.

ACH_FULL_MOON.name: Full Moon
ACH_FULL_MOON.description: Enter the Pure White Dream 2 times as Nachia.

ACH_FIGHTING_COLD_WITH_COLD.name: Fight Fire with Fire
ACH_FIGHTING_COLD_WITH_COLD.description: Defeat the Snowy Mountain King while having 4 Cold damage Memories.

ACH_PRAYER_FOR_THE_DREAMERS.name: Prayer for the Dreamers
ACH_PRAYER_FOR_THE_DREAMERS.description: Enter a new location 12 times while your health is at or below 40% in a single run.

ACH_THEYRE_JUST_BIG_CATS.name: They're Just Big Cats
ACH_THEYRE_JUST_BIG_CATS.description: Land a finishing blow on Thunder Tigers with lightning 25 times.

ACH_EMPRESS_OF_PAIN.name: Empress of Pain
ACH_EMPRESS_OF_PAIN.description: Get cursed a total of 3 times in World 5 or beyond.

ACH_FEELS_LIKE_HOME.name: Feels Like Home
ACH_FEELS_LIKE_HOME.description: Visit 12 rooms occupied by Hunters in a single adventure.

ACH_VINE_IN_CREVICES.name: Thorny Vines Between the Rocks
ACH_VINE_IN_CREVICES.description: Defeat Belphomet within 2 minutes of starting an adventure as Mist.

ACH_VIVID_DREAM.name: Vivid Dream
ACH_VIVID_DREAM.description: Enter the Pure White Dream on Nightmare difficulty.

ACH_SHOOT_FOR_THE_MOON.name: Shoot for the Moon
ACH_SHOOT_FOR_THE_MOON.description: Land 80 finishing blows on enemies from an extreme distance.

ACH_ME_LOVE_GLOWY_STUFF.name: Twinkle Twinkle
ACH_ME_LOVE_GLOWY_STUFF.description: Enter the Pure White Dream while having 4 Active Light Attribute Memories.

ACH_WHY_YOU_BULLY_ME.name: Why You Bully Me?
ACH_WHY_YOU_BULLY_ME.description: Scare or defeat the Merchant 20 times.

ACH_HUNTERS_WHAT_HUNTERS.name: Hunters? What Hunters?
ACH_HUNTERS_WHAT_HUNTERS.description: Enter the Pure White Dream 3 times without slaying any Hunters.

ACH_GO_WITH_THE_FLOW.name: Go with the Flow
ACH_GO_WITH_THE_FLOW.description: Defeat 60 enemies in a row without taking damage as Mist.

ACH_ELECTRIC_TYPE.name: Electric Type
ACH_ELECTRIC_TYPE.description: Deal 1,500 or more damage in a single hit.

ACH_SNAKE_IN_THE_GRASS.name: Snake in the Grass
ACH_SNAKE_IN_THE_GRASS.description: Take the Merchant's unattended backpack 12 times.

ACH_HOTTER_FIRE_WINS.name: Hotter Fire Wins
ACH_HOTTER_FIRE_WINS.description: Defeat the Burning Giant as Vesper while holding 3 or more Fire Memories.

ACH_NO_NEED_FOR_YOUR_HELP.name: I've Got This!
ACH_NO_NEED_FOR_YOUR_HELP.description: Enter the Pure White Dream 2 times without using the Shrine of Guidance.

ACH_GOD_PROTECTS_ME.name: God Protects Me
ACH_GOD_PROTECTS_ME.description: In a single adventure, visit locations occupied by Hunters 4 times while having a Hunt Threat Level of 5.

ACH_OMEGA_POINT.name: Omega Point
ACH_OMEGA_POINT.description: Enter the Pure White Dream while having cast only one type of Memory during a single adventure.

ACH_LOYAL_CUSTOMER.name: Loyal Customer
ACH_LOYAL_CUSTOMER.description: Activate the Shrine of Guidance 15 times in a single adventure.

ACH_PEW_PEW_PEW.name: Pew Pew Pew!
ACH_PEW_PEW_PEW.description: Apply buffs to allies other than yourself a total of 200 times.

ACH_TEKKAI.name: Iron Body
ACH_TEKKAI.description: Gain a Barrier equal to or greater than 300% of your Maximum Health.

ACH_THE_TRUE_FOREST_SOVEREIGN.name: The True Ruler of the Forest
ACH_THE_TRUE_FOREST_SOVEREIGN.description: Defeat the Demon of the Forest 12 times.

ACH_UNTOUCHABLE.name: Untouchable
ACH_UNTOUCHABLE.description: Defeat the Heroic Boss with 85% or more Health remaining as Lacerta.

ACH_EVERYONE_LETS_NOT_PANIC.name: Keep Calm and Carry On
ACH_EVERYONE_LETS_NOT_PANIC.description: Defeat Heroic Bosses 8 times while your Health is below 25%.

ACH_TASTE_OF_THEIR_OWN_MEDICINE.name: Taste of Their Own Medicine
ACH_TASTE_OF_THEIR_OWN_MEDICINE.description: Defeat the Demon of the Forest by clawing it.

ACH_SIBLING_FIGHT.name: Family Feud
ACH_SIBLING_FIGHT.description: As Nachia, defeat the Demon of the Forest within 6 seconds after dealing the first damage.

ACH_IMMORTALITY_ACHIEVED.name: Immortality Achieved
ACH_IMMORTALITY_ACHIEVED.description: Cast Golden Explosion 9 times within 5 seconds as Aurena.

ACH_M_M_M_MONSTER_KILL.name: M-M-M-MONSTER KILL!
ACH_M_M_M_MONSTER_KILL.description: Land a finishing blow on 16 or more enemies with a single Memory cast.

ACH_THE_EIGHTH_TROPHY.name: The Eighth Trophy
ACH_THE_EIGHTH_TROPHY.description: Acquire Unique Memories or Essences from Heroic Bosses 8 times.

ACH_JUST_STAY_STILL.name: Now Now Stay Still
ACH_JUST_STAY_STILL.description: Have 4 Active Memories at once that can Stun, Root, or Knockback.

ACH_ETERNAL_REST.name: Eternal Rest
ACH_ETERNAL_REST.description: Deliver a total of 50 finishing blows to Soul Swordsmen using basic attacks.

ACH_MASTER_OF_MYSTIC_ARTS.name: Master of Mystic Arts
ACH_MASTER_OF_MYSTIC_ARTS.description: Have 4 Active Memories at once with a cooldown of 3 seconds or less.

ACH_THOUSAND_THUNDERS.name: A Thousand Thunders
ACH_THOUSAND_THUNDERS.description: Land a total of 1,000 critical strikes.

ACH_LOOK_RAINBOW.name: Look! A Rainbow!
ACH_LOOK_RAINBOW.description: Enter the Pure White Dream as Bismuth.

ACH_THE_CYCLE_OF_REBIRTH.name: Reincarnation
ACH_THE_CYCLE_OF_REBIRTH.description: As Nachia, defeat a Guardian of Impermanence without taking any damage.

ACH_EMBRACE_MORTALITY.name: Embrace Mortality
ACH_EMBRACE_MORTALITY.description: Get cursed 6 times in a single adventure.

ACH_RUN_ME_LIKE_A_RACE_HORSE.name: Whatever It Takes
ACH_RUN_ME_LIKE_A_RACE_HORSE.description: Defeat an enemy while they have 30 or more Fire stacks.
